mapper.select:
SELECT t_user.`mobile` AS mobile, t_user.`realName` AS NAME, t_invest.investCode AS transactionNumber, t_invest.investTime AS investTime, t_invest.`investAmount` AS investAmount, IF(t_invest.borrowListId=NULL,2,1) AS productType, CASE WHEN (t_invest.flag='-1') THEN '-1' WHEN (t_invest.invest_status=0 AND t_invest.flag=1 AND (t_invest.interestAccrualDate IS NULL OR DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') < t_invest.interestAccrualDate)) THEN '1' WHEN (t_invest.invest_status=0 AND t_invest.flag=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') >= t_invest.interestAccrualDate ) THEN 'beforeBack' WHEN (t_invest.invest_status=1) THEN '7' WHEN (t_invest.invest_status=2) THEN '4' WHEN (t_invest.invest_status=3) THEN '10' ELSE '4' END AS status, t_borrow.`loanNumber` borrowCode FROM t_invest,t_user,t_borrow
t_invest.`investor` = t_user.`id` and t_invest.`borrowId`=t_borrow.`BORROW_ID`
AND t_invest.borrowListId IS NULL
AND t_invest.borrowListId IS NOT NULL
AND t_invest.investCode like CONCAT('%',TRIM(#{transactionNumber}),'%')
AND
t_invest.flag='-1'
t_invest.invest_status=0 AND t_invest.flag=1 AND (t_invest.interestAccrualDate IS NULL OR DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') < t_invest.interestAccrualDate)
t_invest.invest_status=0 AND t_invest.flag=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') >= t_invest.interestAccrualDate
t_invest.invest_status in ('1')
t_invest.invest_status in ('2')
t_invest.invest_status in ('3')
1!=1
AND t_user.mobile like CONCAT('%',TRIM(#{mobile}),'%')
AND t_user.realName like CONCAT('%',TRIM(#{name}),'%')
AND t_invest.investTime >= #{investTimeBegin}
AND t_invest.investTime <= #{investTimeEnd}
